messages.title: SAFER STREETS
messages.content: Zero tolerance on anti-social behaviour. More police on patrolling our streets.

messages.title: BACKING OUR NHS
messages.content: Expanding our local hospitals and services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Delivering Brexit will allow us to focus on the issues that matter - like the NHS, schools, and the police.
Putting 20,000 more police officers on our streets.
Providing the largest cash boost in history for our NHS.
Increased funding for every pupil in every school.

mentions.tacticalSituation: if you vote... You will elect Jeremy Corbyn propped up by Nicola Sturgeon.

issues.education: Increased funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.governance: Get Brexit done and unleash Britain's potential.
issues.health: Expanding our local hospitals and services.
